name: field_types_index
label: Field Types Index
description: Complete index of all available field types in AntiCMS v3

field_types.name: input
field_types.label: Input Field
field_types.description: Input fields are used for short text, numbers, emails, URLs, and more.

field_types.name: textarea
field_types.label: Textarea Field
field_types.description: Textarea fields are used for multi-line text input.

field_types.name: texteditor
field_types.label: Text Editor Field
field_types.description: Text Editor fields provide a WYSIWYG interface for rich text content.

field_types.name: select
field_types.label: Select Field
field_types.description: Select fields provide a dropdown for choosing from predefined options.

field_types.name: toggle
field_types.label: Toggle Field
field_types.description: Toggle fields are used for boolean (on/off) switches.

field_types.name: media
field_types.label: Media Field
field_types.description: Media fields are used for uploading images, videos, audio, or documents.

field_types.name: file
field_types.label: File Field
field_types.description: File fields are used for uploading assets (deprecated - use Media Field instead).

field_types.name: image
field_types.label: Image Field
field_types.description: Image fields are used for uploading images (deprecated - use Media Field instead).

field_types.name: repeater
field_types.label: Repeater Field
field_types.description: Repeater fields allow you to define repeatable groups of fields.

field_types.name: group
field_types.label: Group Field
field_types.description: Group fields allow you to define a single, non-repeatable group of related fields.

field_types.name: relationship
field_types.label: Relationship Field
field_types.description: Relationship fields reference other posts by type, status, category, or search.

field_types.name: post_object
field_types.label: Post Object Field
field_types.description: Post Object fields allow you to select one or more posts as objects.

field_types.name: post_related
field_types.label: Post Related Field
field_types.description: Post Related fields configure related post settings.

field_types.name: table
field_types.label: Table Field
field_types.description: Table fields allow you to define tabular data with custom columns.
